thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Ranil Rajapaksha

author: Ranil Rajapaksha
title: Ranil Rajapaksha
text:
Servcorp Docklands has been an office we have used for many years and both facilities + staff are impressive.
The facilities are always clean, well-presented and very professional.
The staff are also evidently happy to be working there and have a genuine sense of wanting to help you – no task is too big nor too small.
I think one of their biggest assets is Consistency: I can rely on the look and feel of the Servcorp Docklands environment and its constantly being complimented on by my clients. Above all, it’s the consistent, high level of service from all the staff members that are unparalleled.
The location is perfect and the café/restaurant scene is a literally a stone’s throw away.
I have no reservations recommending Servcorp Docklands to any business (startup to multinational) because they have you covered, and it WILL impress clients.
